    • createResizedCopy

      public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createResizedCopy​(java.awt.Image originalImage, int scaledWidth, int scaledHeight, boolean preserveAlpha)
      Returns a resized image of the inputted image.
      Parameters:
      originalImage - Image to rescale
      scaledWidth - width
      scaledHeight - height
      preserveAlpha - true: no alpha, false: preserve alpha
      Returns:
      scaled Buffered Image.
